title: EastEnders spoilers: The truth about abuser Gray revealed as the police question him?
text:
For several months, viewers have seen Gray Atkins (Toby Alexander-Smith) physically assault wife Chantelle (Jessica Plummer) in EastEnders, but he received the shock of his life in tonight’s episode when the police arrived to question him. Could the truth about his violent behaviour finally be revealed?

Earlier this week, Gray revealed to Keegan (Zack Morris) that Karen (Lorraine Stanley) knew Dinah was planning on taking her own life — a revelation which left the Taylor clan reeling. Chantelle was understandably upset with her husband, and proceeded to inform him that it wasn’t his place to reveal such information.

A fuming Gray then made a beeline for his wife — the aggression evident in his face — but Chantelle pleaded with him to stop — reminding him about her pregnancy. Instead of taking his anger out on her, Gray punched the nearby worktop, and made it clear that he would never hurt their unborn child, before storming out.

Tonight’s episode saw Chantelle become worried, as Gray hadn’t returned home on the night in question. However, he did so the following day, and Chantelle voiced her concerns about where he was and what had happened the previous night. Gray was quick to ease her worries, telling her that he simply stayed the night at work, before the pair made up once more.

However, Gray’s problems were far from over as, later in the episode, two police officers — one of whom was Jack (Scott Maslen) — arrived on his doorstep. Curious, Gray quizzed the two officers what their unannounced arrival was in aid of, and they made it clear that they wanted to ask him some questions ‘about last night.’

A nervous Gray stepped aside to the let them in, and — as he did so — the worry was incredibly evident on his face, as he peered around the Square to make sure nobody saw what was happening.

What is it that the police want from Gray?

It seems as if the solicitor is hiding something about what transpired the night before — but just what happened?

We know that he has extreme anger issues, so did he perhaps let his aggression get the better of him once more?

The big question is: via their questioning, will the police discover that Gray’s been abusing his wife?

EastEnders continues on Friday 11th October at 8pm on BBC One.
